feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 5 stages: D, R, I, V, E.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The transcript shows a functioning buy-vs-rent financial tool with detailed financial inputs, computed outputs (costs, mortgage/tax/maintenance breakdowns, graphs), and actionable recommendations, plus evidence of implementation via an AI API and interactive testing. These indicate a thorough, working financial application, meeting the PASS standard.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates a working AI integration that generates contextual recommendations (rent vs buy) and updates dynamically when inputs are changed, indicating the AI adds decision-making value. Discover and Implement evidence show intent and functional incorporation, meeting the moderate standard for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "we have the um home purchase details with the home price, the down payment, the mortgage rate, and the loan term. And then we have the ownership costs here um including the property tax, the annual home insurance, annual maintenance, and the monthly HOA fees." (00:00:47–00:01:16)

"as you can see here, it clearly states um that you should be the recommended option here is to rent rather than buy. And it gives you um total cost over the amount of years that you plan to be there..." (00:01:16–00:01:52)
"And how I got this to work was I used an AI API key to um get the AI to be incorporated into this model." (00:01:52–00:02:30)
criteria.driver_alignment: The DISCOVER stage (identifying a "renter by decision maker" financial tool) shows the student defined a financial application goal; the IMPLEMENT stage (integration via an AI API and interactive input changes) demonstrates a working implementation that performs financial calculations and outputs recommendations.
criteria.reasoning: The transcript shows a functioning buy-vs-rent financial tool with detailed financial inputs, computed outputs (costs, mortgage/tax/maintenance breakdowns, graphs), and actionable recommendations, plus evidence of implementation via an AI API and interactive testing. These indicate a thorough, working financial application, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So what I used or built was a renter by decision maker. um for financial decisions."
"And how I got this to work was I used an AI API key to um get the AI to be incorporated into this model."
"Based on your numbers, buying a home appears to be the better financial decision over a 10-year timeline."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — identified the AI-powered tool and its decision-making purpose; Implement — described using an AI API key and showed the model updating when inputs change.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates a working AI integration that generates contextual recommendations (rent vs buy) and updates dynamically when inputs are changed, indicating the AI adds decision-making value. Discover and Implement evidence show intent and functional incorporation, meeting the moderate standard for a PASS.
